version_description:
- Fixed password settings crash problem on iOS 7 or iPhone 4(S) devices
- Fixed keyboard suggested words issue
- Added email address to feedback box, so we can reply to your posts.

Please wait for next major version for further improvements. We read all your feature requests.

- Fixed password settings crash problem on iOS 7 or iPhone 4(S) devices
- Fixed keyboard suggested words issue
- Added email address to feedback box, so we can reply to your posts.

Please wait for next major version for further improvements. We read all your feature requests.

We have redesigned Account Book. We have added may features for both personal and commercial users.

- You can keep track of your budgets.
- Account Reports
- Improved sharing
- Notifications
- Archive, reverse accounts
- Advanced help
- fast feedback

We have redesigned Account Book. We have added may features for both personal and commercial users.

- You can keep track of your budgets.
- Account Reports
- Improved sharing
- Notifications
- Archive, reverse accounts
- Advanced help
- fast feedback

- Bug fix for crash during account sharing on some devices.
- Pro Book owners can send report for accounts shared by others.
- Other bug fixes

- Bug fix for crash during account sharing on some devices.
- Pro Book owners can send report for accounts shared by others.
- Other bug fixes

- Access your accounts from your computer!
- Password & Login

- Access your accounts from your computer!
- Password & Login

- Custom categories
- Upcoming transactions
- Repeating orders
- More details for transactions (just rotate your device on account screen)

You can manage your accounts with 16 languages:
English, ‏العربية‏, Azərbaycan dili, Deutsch, Español, ‏فارسی, Français, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Bahasa Melayu, Português, Русский, Türkçe, 中文
